messages.content: Hey Suzy, feel free to call me if you have any questions. Have a safe flight!
Thanks! Will do. Looks like I'll be getting in around 3
Actually my flight's been pushed back a bit due to the storms...
Just saw your text! If you get in before 10am, feel free to double-park behind the car in the driveway.
Hi Lupe, in case you need it--the passcode for the lockbox with the housekey is 3254
